description: Runs an OGC API - Processes process that the service provider offers through an instance of OGC API - Processes - Part 2 (Deploy, Replace, Undeploy).

parameters.name: data
parameters.description:
The data to be passed to the OGC API process.

The data must be given in a way that the external process can understand it.

schema.description: A value of any data type.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the OGC API process.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Additional parameters as defined by the OGC API process.

InvalidOgcApiProcess.message: The specified OGC API process identifier does not exist.

returns.description: The data processed by the OGC API process. The returned value can be of any data type and is exactly what the OGC API process returns.
